total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the non-zero elements in the input grid and their positions.
Q2: For each non-zero element, create a 3x3 grid with the non-zero element at the center and the rest of the elements as zero.
Q3: Rotate each 3x3 grid 45 degrees clockwise.
Q4: Combine all the 3x3 grids to form the output grid.
